Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.scrubstudios.srvmon.agent.classes.Service

  • public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a single service check.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Pol Warnimont

    • Constructor Detail

      • Service

        public Service(int id,
       int value,
       java.lang.String cmd,
       java.lang.String checkOutput,
       java.lang.String parameters)
        Constructor for the Service class. Initializes and creates a new service instance.
        Parameters:
        id - ID number for the new service.
        value - Check value for the new service (Usually 4).
        cmd - Command for the new service check.
        checkOutput - Output of the new service (Usually "Check Pending!").
        parameters - Parameters which will be passed to the checkscript.
